name: Lichbolt
description:
Introduction

Lichbolt is a top-down shooter where you, as a ghostly lich, must shoot bouncing firebolts and reflects back arrows in the face of your human jailers, in order to escape the catacombs in which you've been trapped... but not for long!

Note: the game is very short but hopefully polished enough, and serves as a proof of a concept or perhaps one day some free demo.

Play instruction below (also in the game menu)

keyboard+mouse (recommended) / XBOX controller

  • left click/RB to shoot
  • space/LB to dash
  • right click/RT to slash
  • WASD/left stick to move
  • mouse cursor/right stick to aim
  • maintain shift/LT to decenter camera
  • escape/start to open pause menu

Use the button in the settings to reset save, and manage music/sfx volume too
